trans-unit.source: A collection of objects that inherit the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleProvider"></xref> abstract class.

The role providers for an application are exposed as a read-only <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProviderCollection> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Providers%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class.
You can access a specific role provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>.

This enables you to manage role information from multiple data stores in a single application as well as access custom members of a role provider that are not part of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider> abstract class.
Creates a new, empty role-provider collection.
This constructor is not intended to be used from your code.
Adds a role provider to the collection.
This constructor is not intended to be used from your code.
The role provider to add to the collection.
provider is `null`.
provider is not of a type that inherits the abstract class.
Copies the role provider collection to a one-dimensional array.
This method uses <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to copy role provider objects to the specified array.
A one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleProviderCollection"></xref>.
The array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.
Gets the role provider in the collection referenced by the specified provider name.

The role providers for an application are exposed as a read-only <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProviderCollection> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Providers%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class.
You can access a specific role provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>.

This enables you to manage role information from multiple data stores in a single application as well as access custom members of a role provider that are not part of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider> abstract class.
The name of the role provider.
An object that inherits the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleProvider"></xref> abstract class.
